[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@cerbos/embedded](./embedded.md)

## embedded package

Client library for interacting with embedded Cerbos policy decision points generated by [Cerbos Hub](https://hub.cerbos.cloud) from server-side Node.js and browser-based applications.

## Classes

<table><thead><tr><th>

Class


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[Embedded](./embedded.embedded.md)


</td><td>

A client for interacting with an embedded Cerbos policy decision point generated by [Cerbos Hub](https://hub.cerbos.cloud)<!-- -->.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
